title: Asum Gamer BD
description: Asum Gamer BD is a dynamic and interactive game review platform built using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, JWT, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. This website is designed for gamers by a gamer — giving you a space to share your thoughts, discover new games, and connect with fellow gamers.

title: techno blogger
description: Techno Blogger is a modern, full-stack blogging platform built using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, JWT, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. Designed with a fully responsive UI, it works seamlessly on any device, giving users a smooth and engaging experience wherever they are.

title: School
description: Welcome to Kuripara High School's official website, proudly built by a former student using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT, GSAP, and Tailwind CSS. This site helps students, teachers, and guardians stay updated, connected, and informed about school news, notices, and achievements.

title: Royal Restaurant
description: Royal Restaurant a modern, full-stack restaurant website crafted to deliver a smooth, visually appealing, and responsive experience for users. The frontend is built with React.js and TypeScript,  Vite  Tailwind CSS, offering a sleek and mobile-friendly layout, while GSAP is used to animations that bring the interface to life.

title: Pathan UI
description: Pathan UI is a component-based UI library that offers beautifully designed components built with React, Tailwind CSS, raw CSS, and sometimes plain HTML. It includes a wide range of reusable elements like buttons, cards, forms, and more—perfect for speeding up development. All components are free to use in any React application, making it a valuable frontend project for developers looking for clean, customizable, and ready-to-use UI elements.

title: Toimur Hasan Pronoy
description: Pronoy Website is a personal portfolio site created for Toimur Hasan Pronoy, developed by Ashraful Pathan. It’s a frontend project built with Next.js and TypeScript, featuring a beautiful UI and smooth animations powered by GSAP. The site is fully responsive, fast, and deployed on Vercel. If you’re interested in having a similar website built at an affordable price, feel free to contact me.
